item.title: Apple Maps Cycling Directions Expand to Taiwan and Hong Kong
item.description: Apple Maps has expanded the availability of cycling routes in East Asia by adding support for Taiwan and Hong Kong. Apple first added cycling directions to ‌‌Apple Maps‌‌ in iOS 14, providing specific
